title: Hour 2-  Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Host
itunes:title: Hour 2-  Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Host
description:
Doug and TJ in for Dan.  They weigh in on the troubling news about a shooting death at a youth football game.  Doug and TJ talk about the difficulties the Cowboys continue to have with penalties. FOX Sports Radio Insider Adam Caplan joins Doug and TJ to talk about the latest with Lamar Jackson,  Deshaun Watson and the other main NFL headlines coming off of the weekend.  Doug and TJ disagree about Lebron James being one of the great Lakers.

#DougGottliebShow  #UpOnGame

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
